activity.name: Berliner Bear-Hug Booth
activity.description: One euro for 30 seconds of aggressive but affirming hugging from a man in a bear suit.

seed: Someone replaced the retreat agenda with poetry.

messages.content: guys, operation nightdrive. we hit the streets.
moonlight meditations? üåú‚ú® Energetic alignment is key tonight.
trash. all of it.
Let's matrix this. Party Metrics v0.2 coming up.
Calendar is a nightmare. when are we free?
nightdrive = chaos. berlin style. you in?
mushrooms enhance night vision. FYI.
Guys, what about syncing our vibes at a booth?
never.
Any slots next... Tuesday? For anything?
operation nightdrive = now or never
ü§Ø Can we just choose already?
There's wisdom in steam. Just saying.
what'bout bear hugs? chaotic enough?
üêª YES! Bear hugs!
Does it fit into... ahh, forget it.
Fine. But it's stupid.
How to even rank that...?
it's chaos. chic. berlin. let's do it.
Bear steams you in his embrace.
I've created a doc called regret.ops
Sending positive vibes for the hugs üåÄ
7:45 sharp?
chaos is booked. 7:45 sharp.
üöÆ
This will be... noted in Chaos Ladder v3.
we're doing it. see you in the fog.
